description.en:
[b]1) The Restaurant of Many Orders[/b] (Soko wa Chuumon no Ooi Ryouriten)
A young woman frequents a certain French bistro. She would really enjoy the food they serve if only it weren't for the bossy chef owner. "You may not like me, but I love your food."

[b]2) Invisible Girl in Love[/b] (Toumei Ningen no Koi)
A story about a socially awkward girl who's kept to herself for so long that she may as well be invisible to her classmates. Then, one day, she falls in love.

[b]3) Matryoshka[/b]
A sweet analogy of the Russian doll: Matryoshka.
As each doll is opened up to give another one, so do each memory containing his feelings towards her.

[b]4) The Selfish Couple[/b]

[b]5) Drops.[/b]
A series of interconnected vignettes depicting how something as ordinary as rain can alter the course of people's lives.

[u][b]Polish / Polski:[/b][/u]  [spoiler]Matryoshka:
Historia przedstawiona jako metafora do Matrioszki - rosyjskiej lalki.
Każda lalka kryje w sobie następną. Każde kolejne wspomnienie przybliża go do jego prawdziwych uczuć.
[/spoiler]
